channel.title: Fix mage...HELP PLEASE!
channel.description: Well a lot of spells work on my server in fact nearly all but they splash WAAAAYYY too often in wild how do i fix this? I hit like 1 out of very 20 casts of ice burst and 1-100 barrage and no others work in wild yet they full work on npcs??? and also how do i fix so ALL spells require runes?

omfg i do have ecto tokens and it says i dont have enough runes?
